ing: 3 tablespoons peanut butter, or to taste
des: "This recipe has been in my family for years. As kids, we would eat the bottom of the cake and save the frosting for last. Got milk?"
ins: Combine brown sugar, butter, cream, vanilla, and peanut butter in a large sauce pan. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, stirring frequently. Remove from heat and add confectioners' sugar and mix well. Pour over a cooled cake and spread frosting quickly.
